name: Onyphe_Summary
author: Andrea Garavaglia, Davide Arcuri - LDO-CERT
description: Retrieve summary information Onyphe has for the given IPv{4,6} address.

configurationItems.name: key
configurationItems.description: Define the API key to use to connect the service

configurationItems.name: verbose_taxonomies
configurationItems.description: Set true if you want detailed taxonomies for port, subnet, geoloc, domain
